title: What league players think the word toxic means
body:
Anything that implies something negative and/or goes against their opinion.

IE. you could say, wow that sucked
IE. "Who fed the enemy jungler?" Implying your teammates suck (according to the people in my last game)
IE. You can get banned for not communicating, so if you don't talk or ping you'll be banned.
IE. If you don't buy sightstone you'll be banned :^)

There really needs to be something in place to make it not so ridiculous what people can ban for.
My last game my ashe only bought wards and told us she was feeding, and brand AFK'd. But I'm the bad guy for asking who fed the Lee Sin.

I don't get it

and they could label it toxic, because they can abuse the word, and riot's system.


league of children :^)

DISCLAIMER: THIS IS JUST A RANT
